title: Best Pig Breeds For Commercial Pig Farming

tasks.task: Identify the best pig breeds for commercial farming in Africa.
subtasks: Determine the popularity and traits of the Large White breed.
Explain the prolific nature and resistance of the Landrace breed.
Mention the characteristics of the Hampshire breed.
Introduce the TN70 breed as a cross between Large White and Landrace.
Highlight the growth and breeding capabilities of the Camboro breed.
Advise on the suitability of Duroc breed for crossbreeding programs.
Advocate for purebred or crossbred approaches based on market demand.
Recommend the Piétrain breed as a newer option in the market.

tasks.task: For instance, after selecting a breed based on the advice, you need to tend to the pigs. So maybe an abstraction: MAINTASK: Manage a commercial pig farm using appropriate breeds. Subtasks:
subtasks: Refill pig feed troughs as needed.
